properties.description: Address: Neetside Community Centre, Leven Road, Bude, Cornwall, EX23 8LB Cornwall Area: North Cornwall Hub Area: Bude Hub Name: Neetside Community Centre Opening Times: Mon - Fri 09:00 - 17:00 Activities Offered: Mon 10:00 - 14:00 (weekly) Bude Volunteers Bureau Mon 12:00 - 15:00 (weekly) SILC Counselling Mon 14:00 - 16:00 (2nd and 4th Monday) Neetside Knitters Tue 14:00 - 16:00 (weekly) Craft and Wellbeing Sessions Wed 10:00 - 12:00 (weekly) Cornwall Mind Peer Support Thurs 9:00 - 13:00 (weekly) SILC Counselling Thurs 14:00 – 16:00 (2nd Thursday) Bereavement Café Thurs 14:00 – 16:00 (1st and 3rd Thursday) Bude Stroke Support Friday 10:00 – 12:00 (Parkhouse, 1st and 3rd Friday) Cuppa Companions Friday 10:00 – 12:00 (Library, 2nd and 4th Friday) Community Coffee Morning Sat 10:30 - 13:00 (last Sat of the month) Volunteer Bureau, Repair Café, and Community Larder Public Contact Name: Vika Bundy Public Phone: 01288 353403 or 07308 353403 Public Email: vika@neetside.co.uk Notes: https://neetside.co.uk/neetside-community-hub/ Integrated Care Area: North and east
